/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the road, looking down the length of the highway. On either side of the highway, there are trees and buildings, their details slightly blurred due to the distance. The highway itself is divided by a concrete barrier, and there are streetlights lining both sides, standing like sentinels in the daylight. The image does not contain any text or discernible actions. The relative positions of the objects suggest a quiet, early morning or late afternoon scene, with no visible traffic or pedestrians. The image is a snapshot of a typical day in a bustling city, yet devoid of the usual hustle and bustle.
